config.name: akamai_performance
config.timeoutMessage: Your request has timed out. Please enter the url again.
config.message0: Compares estimated performance over Akamai with actual performance direct to Origin. Breaks down total page download time in to connection time, first byte time and download time.
config.message1: Provides a benchmark for expected performance improvement over one week from a given city to the region in which the Origin is based.
config.message2: Compares estimated performance between Akamai and Origin, per city.
config.message3: Dots on the map indicate the locations of Akamai testing agents. Click on these dots to simulate end user connection times from those locations.
config.message4: Compares estimated average performance between Akamai and Origin, per continent.
config.message7: Provides a benchmark for expected performance improvement over one week from a given city to the region in which the Origin is based.
